meanings.definition: A person actively involved in politics.
meanings.sent1: The town hall was filled with politicos discussing the upcoming election.
meanings.sent2: Politicos often attend rallies and debates to support their candidates.
meanings.sent3: The politicos at the city council meeting had a heated debate over the new policy.
meanings.sent4: In the world of politicos, alliances can shift quickly and unexpectedly.
meanings.sent5: She stood out among the politicos with her passionate speeches and strong convictions.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to politics or politicians.
meanings.sent1: The newspaper published a politicos article analyzing the latest government decision.
meanings.sent2: The students had a lively discussion about the politicos issues affecting their community.
meanings.sent3: His politicos jokes always brought a smile to everyone's face.
meanings.sent4: The atmosphere in the room was charged with politicos tension before the debate.
meanings.sent5: The documentary provided a behind-the-scenes look at the politicos world of campaigning.
